name: Suika game 3D
description:
What is better than a 2D watermelon? A 3D one!
The evolution of the watermelon game with a new level of depth! Suika game 3D.

A fun puzzle game in which you will have to use logic to combine different fruits to get a watermelon in a 3D environment.

Test your logic and intelligence level with this relaxing game for the whole family.

Try to get the best score and share it with your friends at the meeting point to see who is the best.

Welcome to the 3 dimensional world of suika game 3D!
